articles.title: When will Connelly Early pitch next for Red Sox? Alex Cora explains
articles.description:
Connelly Early could earn another start next week at Fenway Park.

summary: Connelly Early is expected to start next week at Fenway Park.

This could enhance fan engagement and team performance in Boston.

articles.title: Bruins goalie Simon Zajicek displays true colors in loss to Penguins at Prospects Challenge
articles.description:
Zajicek had several outstanding stops against the Penguins.

The post Bruins goalie Simon Zajicek displays true colors in loss to Penguins at Prospects Challenge appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Goalie Simon Zajicek showcased impressive skills during the Bruins' loss to the Penguins.
Zajicek made several outstanding stops, demonstrating potential for the upcoming season.
His performance at the Prospects Challenge may influence roster decisions for Boston's 2025 season.

articles.title: Scott Boras says he, Alex Bregman are ‘waiting until the offseason’ before making opt-out decision
articles.description:
“We’re at the point now where you wait until the offseason and see what transpires. … He has enjoyed it there.”

The post Scott Boras says he, Alex Bregman are ‘waiting until the offseason’ before making opt-out decision appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Scott Boras confirms Alex Bregman will decide on opt-out after the offseason.
Bregman has expressed enjoyment playing for the Red Sox this season.
Boston fans may see roster changes depending on Bregman's decision in the offseason.

articles.title: A Thoreau impersonator bids a fond farewell to Walden Pond
articles.description:
After 26 years in character as the 19th-century transcendentalist writer, Richard Smith is hanging up his straw hat.

The post A Thoreau impersonator bids a fond farewell to Walden Pond appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Richard Smith ends 26 years as a Thoreau impersonator at Walden Pond.
His farewell marks the end of a unique local tradition in Concord.
Visitors to Walden Pond will miss his educational performances and insights.
